<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Serialize the remarks to LLVM bitstream.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This class provides ways to emit remarks in the LLVM bitstream format and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// its associated metadata.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#42; The separate model:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">///                         | String table</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">///                         | External file</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">///   Separate remarks:     | Container info</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Implementation of the remark serializer using LLVM bitstream.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer/#a42696d420acd17e7e8ab585db9f0b5c4">BitstreamRemarkSerializer</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/remarkserializer/#a78423a0a6a3684579a42b75fb2e85875">RemarkSerializer</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The file should contain:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 1) The block info block that describes how to read the blocks.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 2) The metadata block that contains various information about the remarks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///    in the file.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 3) A number of remark blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// We need to set up 1) and 2) first, so that we can emit 3) after. This flag</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is used to emit the first two blocks only once.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer/#a4b04e17884b4aab23e73cf48d515d1b5"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer/#a4b04e17884b4aab23e73cf48d515d1b5">DidSetUp</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The helper to emit bitstream.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer/#a65ad27a674514a190c2417b69a79c65c"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializerhelper">BitstreamRemarkSerializerHelper</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/bitstreamremarkserializer/#a65ad27a674514a190c2417b69a79c65c">Helper</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Construct a serializer that will create its own string table.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
